antibiotic_prophylaxis_timing: Antibiotic prophylaxis was not administered within the recommended time frame prior to incision.
antibiotic prophylaxis was not administered timely
potential delay in antibiotic prophylaxis timing during the initial surgery
found it was delayed, potentially contributing to the infection.
Antibiotics were administered within the appropriate timeframe before the procedure.
discharge_instructions_unclear: discharge plan did not adequately address respiratory exercises
Discharge instructions were vague, leading to confusion about medication regimen
ready for discharge; all discharge instructions have been provided
inadequate bowel regimen instructions prior to discharge
unclear instructions about respiratory exercises and ambulation
uncontrolled_pain: pain is well controlled and rates pain as 3/10
significant relief from pain after receiving prescribed medications.
